name: frompoints
title: Trajectory from Points
description: Convert a table of timestamped points in trajectories.

inputs.name: input_table
inputs.title: Input table
inputs.description: The table with the timestamped points per row

inputs.name: input_traj_id_column
inputs.title: Trajectory ID column
inputs.description: The name of the column storing the trajectory identifier

inputs.name: input_geom_column
inputs.title: Geometry column
inputs.description: The name of the column storing the geometry (point)

inputs.name: input_t_column
inputs.title: Timestamp column
inputs.description: The name of the column storing the timestamp column

inputs.name: input_tpoints_column
inputs.title: Name for the trajectory points column
inputs.description: Column to be used to define the trajectory points

inputs.name: input_properties_columns
inputs.title: Properties columns
inputs.description: All the columns to be stored as a JSON-encoded string per timestamp

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with the transformed data
